metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace by Raphjay2406

plugins.name: modulo
plugins.description: Premium frontend design system with 59 skills, 9 commands, and 12 agents for creating 90k-quality websites. Covers UI patterns, e-commerce, payments, CMS, maps, social features, PWA, analytics, multi-tenant, onboarding, print/PDF, design tokens, SEO/GEO, accessibility, i18n, performance, testing, and more. Includes specialized agents for auditing, Figma translation, documentation, migration, and design system health. Works with Next.js and Astro.

plugins.name: wavy-bavy
plugins.description: Integrate the wavy-bavy library for seamless wave transitions between page sections
